content.text: The major shareholders of JPST stock are as follows:
BlackRock, Inc. is the largest institutional shareholder of JPST stock, owning approximately 4.8% of the total shares outstanding.
Vanguard Group, Inc. is another significant institutional shareholder, owning around 3.7% of the total shares outstanding.
State Street Corporation holds approximately 2.2% of the total shares, making it a notable institutional investor in JPST stock.
Insiders, including company executives and board members, also have a stake in JPST stock. The exact percentage of insider ownership is not publicly disclosed.

JPST stock has a diverse ownership structure with significant holdings from institutional investors like BlackRock, Inc. and Vanguard Group, Inc. Insiders also have ownership in the company, but the exact percentage is not available.
